sv:property.sv:value:
• Days at the beach or pool can be enjoyable no matter how hot the sun gets (caution: contains no SPF protection).
  • Create fun recreation activities in any season by building an ice skating rink, igloos and much more.
  • Virtually eliminate your air-conditioning bill in hotter months. Acme suggests pairs with Fire power for year-round comfort.

• Point-and-Shoot feature generates ice in any direction instantly.
  • Control the size and shape of ice formations with your thought preferences.
  • Automatically adjust the climate surrounding you (limited to a 100-meter radius, or 5000 cubic meters enclosed).
Ice powers enable instant freeze capabilities. In addition, you can create ice formations without a water supply, such as ice cubes, skating rinks or even decorative sculptures.

• Runners and triathletes, set your personal bests repeatedly, without worrying about the results of performance-enhancing substance tests.
  • Gain up to 2 hours credit towards your Superhero Community Service commitment in only minutes of work: simply grab a first responder (medic, police, etc) and rush them to the scene of an emergency.
  • You’ll never have to worry about missing the game again, since you’ll be able to run out for food, drinks and other errands, and still make it back before halftime is over.

• Set quantifiable speeds for your own body (human-powered movement only), as well as inanimate objects under your direct control.
  • Unique Speed Burst feature can move you over land in fractions of a second - as close to teleportation as currently possible.
  • Rapidly engage the Brake capability if you find your achieved speed too much to handle; as with other super powers, you control Speed with your thought preferences.

No matter what you’re doing, you can do it faster with Acme’s Speed super power. From a 100 meter foot race to amping up your laptop’s processing power, you and whatever you touch can simply go faster. And as everyone’s favorite Nascar driver said, “If you’re not first, you’re last.”

• Protect your family by performing periodic drop-ins on babysitters and other service providers you need to trust in your home alone.
  • Knowing what your coworkers really think of you when you’re not around will help you climb the corporate ladder faster.
  • Fulfill your Acme Superhero Community Service requirement by assisting law enforcement professionals with catching criminals in the act.

• Become invisible in literally the blink of an eye - Instant-On within 1/10 second.
  • Cutting edge Garment-Perimeter technology means no more worrying about changing in and out of clothes and embarrassing switch-backs. When you’re invisible, so is everything you’re wearing.
  • New Invisi-tection alerts you when others around you are also utilizing their Invisibility power.

One of the most sought-after super powers since the beginning of the superhero concept, Invisibility allows you to move completely unnoticed among crowds of people. Acme requires additional personality assessments prior to purchase, due to the highly sensitive nature of this power.

• Gain the confidence to try extreme sports or other recreational activities by removing the fear of injury.
  • Always been injury-prone, with friends and family constantly fretting about your safety? Give them peace of mind, knowing that your clumsiness can no longer hurt you.
  • Never take a sick day again; or at least, use them for a “Ferris Bueller” day instead.

• Seal an open wound in a fraction of a second; scars fade to nearly invisible within an hour.
  • Cure any bacterial or viral infection, even recover from jet lag, instantly.
  • Patented Health Monitoring System detects the presence of any potential microscopic threat and automatically engages the Healing function.

Injury and illness can be an uncomfortable interruption to daily life. The Healing power lets you stop these inconveniences the second they start. Note: Healing powers are only available for the individual owner and cannot be applied to third parties at this time.

• Fulfill your Superhero Community Service easily by spending a few hours at any “clean tech” wind farm.
  • Enjoy unlimited perfect sailing conditions - or create challenging courses to improve your boat-handling skills.
  • Provide powerful defense shields for yourself, friends and family by simply blowing away dangerous criminals or objects.

• Options for gradual wind speed increase and decrease, as well as patented Instant-Blast feature.
  • Directed over ocean or lake surfaces, Wind power can create tsunami-like walls of water (Acme advises extreme caution when deploying).
  • Wind direction, speed and temperature can be controlled by thought preferences, with built-in timer functions.

Whether for recreation, utilities, or self-defense, Wind power provides a wide range of capabilities for Acme Superheroes. Gentle breezes to gale force winds can be generated instantly, and modified on the fly.

• Automatic self-defense from misuse of super powers by others prevents anxiety and worry.
  • Eliminate the fear of second-hand smoke, air pollution and harmful microbes traveling by air.
  • Since the Immunity shield automatically acts as sunblock with an equivalent of SPF 100, immunity is a perfect complement to your other Element powers.

• Create a force-field around you and your immediate surrounding area, impenetrable to other super powers.
  • Block dangerous UVA and UVB rays and other types of radiation.
  • New Pulmonary Purifier acts as a virtual face mask, making it impossible to inhale harmful pollution and other impurities.

With the growing Acme customer base, there are now more superheroes than ever engaging their powers. With Immunity, you can block the effect of other powers if any are directed at you. (Please report any irresponsible use to Acme; contracts restrict the use of any power against another person.)

• Host outdoor barbeques or camping expeditions without fear of running out of propane or firewood.
  • In cold climates, proper use in indoor fireplaces can dramatically reduce heating bills.
  • Fulfill your Superhero Community Service commitment by assisting firefighters with setting “flame borders” to control wildfires.

• Shoot flames from either the tips of your fingers or create a standalone blaze anywhere within a 100-meter radius.
  • Use your thoughts to control the amount of heat and height of the flame.
  • A built-in timer function can auto-extinguish the flame when no thought inputs are provided for a set period of time.

The Fire super power allows you to create fire instantly, with no fuel source required. You can control the temperature, size and direction of the flame with only your thoughts. Acme cautions its customers to be responsible with this power, as it can cause significant injury and property damage.

• Save thousands of dollars on commercial air travel expenses per year - and countless amounts of frustration.
  • Frequent business travellers can apply for expense reimbursement of equivalent value of each flight segment (contact Acme to see if your company participates in this program).
  • Unlike traditional air travel vehicles, you’ll be able to experience flight as nature intended - quietly, with zero emissions and breathtaking views.

• Integration with regional Air Traffic Control (ATC) communication systems ensures you’ll never wander into Class A or military airspace.
  • Choose your destination and desired travel time, and Acme will present a detailed flight plan via an On-Retina Display.
  • Receive weather condition and other flight status information prior to departure, via email, text or even telepathically.
Long lines at airport security and cramped coach seats are a thing of the past. With the power of Flight, you can move through the air at the time and pace you want.

• Painful regrets about specific decisions or events in your past can now be resolved, by traveling back in time to correct your mistakes.
  • While banned by the NV gaming commission and in gambling establishments, you can still travel to the future to know the results of highly anticipated sporting events, elections and more.
  • If you are able to prevent casualties or loss related to natural disasters, you may qualify for up to a 50 credit hours towards future Superhero Community Service requirements.

• Set the exact date and time, or use more obscure parameters (such as “the day before I met my spouse”), to specify where in time’s continuum you want to visit.
  • Built-in Analysis and Alarm systems will notify you if an action you take in a different “era” will have a significant impact on your present experience.
  • Due to current-time readjustment issues discovered in a recent blockbuster film, all trips are restricted to 1 hour in duration.
Whether you want to travel to the future to know who will win the Superbowl, or to the past to undo some embarrassing faux pas, Time Travel will provide the ultimate control over your life’s events.

• Fly on any commercial airline at a heavily discounted rate, as X-Ray Vision automatically qualifies you to serve as a civilian flight marshal.
  • Fulfill your Acme Superhero Community Service commitment by donating a few hours of scanning to local police or other organizations.
  • Immediately detect the presence of concealed weapons or other illegal objects, so you can avoid dangerous situations.

• Standard setting for visibility through most low-density materials (fabric, leather, etc).
  • Max View feature provides you with a 10-second burst to see through high-density materials, including concrete, brick and metal.
  • Built-in Blurring capabilities will render privacy shields around unsuspecting bystanders, protecting you from legal or ethical concerns.

Made popular by the original Superman, X-Ray Vision lets you see what others are hiding. By being aware of your surroundings, you can avoid dangerous situations - or just have a little fun with your friends.

• Driving at night is safer with Night Vision, as it captures the depth and detail that the natural eye can miss.
  • Reduce anxiety surrounding certain nighttime activities, such as late-night dog walks, third shift work, and more.
  • Fulfill your Superhero Community Service requirement by assisting local law enforcement and fire fighters who may not have access to expensive military-grade equipment.

• Goggle-Free technology means your own eyes act as infrared sensors; no bulky equipment to keep up with.
  • Advanced Depth Perception feature captures important information about distance and size of objects in your line of sight, all within an unobtrusive On-Retinal display.
  • Crisp, accurate details are visible from a distance of up to 100 meters.

You’ll never be afraid of the dark again with Acme’s Night Vision power. Similar to the advanced infrared technology used by military professionals, Night Vision lets you see exactly what is around you - using no light source that could reveal your position or disturb others.
